DOC.brief_title: Assessment Daily Disposable Silicone Hydrogel Lens Wear
DOC.criteria: Able read , comprehend sign inform consent ( parental consent/subject assent , appropriate ) . Willing comply study visit schedule . Ages 15 39 . Has access cellular telephone text messaging capability . Has current pair spectacle . 'Neophyte ' In work , 'neophyte ' take mean subject never dispense contact lenses . A subject take part nondispensing clinical study fit contact lens practice never go actually wear lens , also classify 'neophyte ' . Spherical contact lens ( CL ) prescription 0.75D 6.00D spectacle cylinder equal le 0.75 DC . Monocular bestcorrected distance visual acuity ( VA ) â‰¥ 20/30 Snellen eye . Subject agree `` intent '' wear CLs minimum 6 hours/day least 4 day per week . They agree participate clinical research duration study . Active ocular allergy , infection , injury , inflammation , abnormality ( e.g. , keratoconus ) might interfere soft contact lens wear . Prior corneal refractive surgery corneal irregularity ( e.g. , keratoconus ) . Systemic disease , might interfere contact lens wear . Medication usage may associate eye dryness . Use topical medication eye drop ointment . Pregnant lactating ( selfreport ) . Aphakia . Grade 2 great follow ocular surface sign : corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , tarsal conjunctival change abnormality , would normally contraindicate contact lens wear . Have participate clinical trial research two week prior start study .
